title: Stanley Tucci Pulled Inspiration from Alfred Hitchcock’s ‘North by Northwest’ for His New Cashmere Collection
summary: Before stepping back into the fashion industry as Nigel in “The Devil Wears Prada, Stanley Tucci is bringing his signature sophistication to the cashmere world. The Emmy and Golden Globe–winning actor has teamed with British luxury knitwear house N.Peal on an exclusive AW25 capsule collection entit…
